author: ianna
body:
- Relabelling with new Rec numbering record
- Hcal topology and geometry built from Rec numbering record
- Deleted obsolete files
- Updated configuration files
- Removed verbosity
- Propagate record dependency changes to all modules using HcalTopology
- Remove unneeded Hcal topology constants from configurations
title: Hcal Topology and Numbering Records
